line.text: 'Finished station kits need a TL to place them.'

line.comment: * $t = columnize menu text: array= $t, text= ' ', alignment= -1, colour= 0, column width= 350

line.text: 'Terracorp is required by Terran laws to bear the construction costs of all Outposts.'
'Auto Station Building & Placement by an Architect TL Worker is in the Outpost Administration section.'

line.comment: * $t = columnize menu text: array= $t, text= 'Item', alignment= -1, colour= 0, column width= 300
* $t = columnize menu text: array= $t, text= 'Cost', alignment= -1, colour= 0, column width= 150
* add custom menu heading to array $menu: title=$t

line.text: '1 Black Crystal - 3000 Teladianium - 1300 Rastar Oil - 5000 Ore'
'to gain more slots unlock the Fortress perk in any Outpost.'

sval.val: Finished station kits need a TL to place them.
Terracorp is required by Terran laws to bear the construction costs of all Outposts.
Auto Station Building & Placement by an Architect TL Worker is in the Outpost Administration section.
Cannot build OWP in this sector.
1 Black Crystal - 3000 Teladianium - 1300 Rastar Oil - 5000 Ore
Maximum number of Orbital Weapons Platforms (
to gain more slots unlock the Fortress perk in any Outpost.
